mods.railcraft.api.carts

Interface IItemTransfer


  • public interface IItemTransfer
    This interface allows items to be passed around with out needing to know anything about the underlying implementation of the inventories.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemStack offerItem(java.lang.Object source, ItemStack offer)
      Offers an ItemStack to the object implementing this interface.
      ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source)
      Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface.
      ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source, IStackFilter request)
      Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface that matches the request parameter.
      ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source, ItemStack request)
      Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface that matches the request parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • offerItem

        ItemStack offerItem(java.lang.Object source,
                  ItemStack offer)
        Offers an ItemStack to the object implementing this interface. This function will return null if the item is accepted in full, otherwise it will return whatever is rejected.
        Parameters:
        source - The Object offering the item
        offer - The ItemStack being offered
        Returns:
        Unused or unwanted portions of offer

      • requestItem

        ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source)
        Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface. It is up to the object implementing this interface to determine which ItemStack to return, or none at all.
        Parameters:
        source - The Object submitting the request
        Returns:
        An ItemStack to fulfill the request or null if refused.

      • requestItem

        ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source,
                    ItemStack request)
        Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface that matches the request parameter. It is up to the object implementing this interface to determine which ItemStack to return, or none at all. However, if the return value is not null it should fulfill the following condition:
        InvTools.isItemEqual(it.requestItem(this,request), request) == true
        Parameters:
        source - The Object submitting the request
        request - The type of item requested
        Returns:
        An ItemStack to fulfill the request or null if refused.

      • requestItem

        ItemStack requestItem(java.lang.Object source,
                    IStackFilter request)
        Requests an ItemStack from the object implementing this interface that matches the request parameter. It is up to the object implementing this interface to determine which ItemStack to return, or none at all. However, if the return value is not null it should fulfill the following condition:
        IStackFilter.matches(it.requestItem(this,request), request) == true
        Parameters:
        source - The Object submitting the request
        request - The type of item requested
        Returns:
        An ItemStack to fulfill the request or null if refused.
